title: can we do something about caits traps?their super annoying
body:
1. decrease how many she can put out (she likes to put a bunch of them under enemies tower trapping them from comming from under it)
2. let them be destroyed or at least let minions trigger them 
3. not make the snare instant, (places them right under you for instant snare or throws them behind her when running away from enemies for instent snares) 
4. make their duration shorter (feels like them things last 10 fuckin minutes i swear)

replies.body:
1. She can only put 5 max
2. That would be stupid
3. Its not instant. It has more than 1 sec delay
4. They last only 90 seconds
i mean, you really just have to walk around them
